title: Allows an action for unlawful discriminatory practice to be brought within three years after dismissal for administrative convenience
summary: Authorizes the institution of a suit in any court of competent jurisdiction alleging a violation of the human rights law for a period of three years after the dismissal of a complaint for administrative convenience by the division of human rights.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to institution of court actions under section 297 thereof
